Flying, ward {1} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)[/i]
[i]Focus[/i] – Whenever Catria attacks and isn't blocked, the next spell you cast this turn costs {2} less to cast.
[i]Sisterhood[/i] – If you control a creature named Est and a creature named Palla, Pegasi you control have “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.”
